examples: Holothrix cernua (Burm.f.) Schelpe in Orch. Rev., 74(882): 394 (1966). Osmundites natalensis (Fossil Fern) in Ann & Mag. Nat. Hist., ser. 12, 8: 652-656 (1955).
source: D.H. Kent 1990. Missouri Bryological List. Taxon 35(3): 644-645 (1986). H.T. Clifford's list of Palaeobotanists. Bothalia, 16: 97-108 (1986) incl. portr. & bibliogr..
summary: Schelpe, Edmund André Charles Lois Eloi (`Ted') (1924-1985)
